The image loading code is shared between the platforms, so marking report as a duplicate of bug 42457 since the problem is the same and your two images are attached there as well.


*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 42457 ***
reopening because this is not the same problem that bug 42457 started with
More importantly, this appears to be fixed in the 3.3 stream, as I can reproduce the problem with 3.2 but not with HEAD.  Marking as FIXED.
